title: Was the Empire State Building Lit Green on 9/11 for a Muslim Holiday?
subtitle: Anti-Islam articles falsely reported that the Empire State Building would be illuminated green on September 11 in honor of the Muslim festival of Eid-al-Adha.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: President Obama is planning on lighting the Empire State Building green to celebrate the Muslim holiday of Eid al-Fitr on 11 September 2016.
